comment.author: 17279252@N06
comment._content: This photo is not Fort Worth.  It is Cleburne, Texas, which located about 20 miles south of both Everman and Benbrook flying fields (Taliaferro #2 and #3).  The building in the center is the Cooke County Courthouse.

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the update! So it would be the Johnson County Courthouse, we think?

comment.author: 17279252@N06
comment._content: Oops.  Yes, it is the Johnson County Courthouse.
